attributes.action: Pay rise for ALL employees that work for the NHS on the next Budget
attributes.additional_details: Because claps don’t put food on the table
attributes.background: Stop clapping and start paying the NHS

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
